properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 3:20PM AKST until January 1 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8
inches.

* WHERE...The Anchorage area, including Eagle River and
Birchwood.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 AM AKST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and difficult travel.
Visibility will be limited in heavy snowfall.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rapidly falling temperatures will occur
this evening and into tonight. Expect temperatures to drop to
about 20F by midnight with brisk winds.
properties.instruction:
weather to stay safe. Dress for cold conditions.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY
